bibl.title: The Missing Link. Greek Pagan Historiography in the Second Half of the Third Century and in the Fourth Century AD. Translated by Dorota DZIERZBICKA.

series.title: The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume

bibl.note: Introduction. - Chapter One. Political Historiography. - Chapter Two. Local Historiography. - Chapter Three. Histories and Biographies of Emperors. - Chapter Four. Chronography. - Appendix: Greek and Latin Authors in Historia Augusta. - Conclusion. - Bibliography. Index. - Several chapters are devoted to texts preserved (or partly preserved) on papyrus: in part., P. Oxy. LXIII, 4352 and P. Stras. Inv. 481 (= Pack2 1849).
bibl.seg: JANISZEWSKI Pawel, The Missing Link. Greek Pagan Historiography in the Second Half of the Third Century and in the Fourth Century AD. Translated by Dorota DZIERZBICKA. (The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume VI.)
Warsaw, The Journal of Juristic Papyrology, 2006, 8Â°, xii-532 pp. ISBN 83-918250-5-1.

Introduction. - Chapter One. Political Historiography. - Chapter Two. Local Historiography. - Chapter Three. Histories and Biographies of Emperors. - Chapter Four. Chronography. - Appendix: Greek and Latin Authors in Historia Augusta. - Conclusion. - Bibliography. Index. - Several chapters are devoted to texts preserved (or partly preserved) on papyrus: in part., P. Oxy. LXIII, 4352 and P. Stras. Inv. 481 (= Pack2 1849).
